name: Deus Ex: Insurrection
summary: Every nation needs you. Every nation fears you. The five superpowers of the 2020's will rise or fall based on the kind of intelligence only you can deliver. Underground  laboratories, military bases, skyscrapers, capital buildings, embassies... no haven is so well-defended that you can't hack, sneak, bribe, fight, or talk your way in.
storyline: Twenty years before the events of Deus Ex 1, an escalating international arms race has resulted in a perilous standoff. As Blake Denton, father of JC and Paul Denton, you have talents that can either serve or undermine the cult of secrecy the United States government depends on -- and in turn sheer the course of world events.
